thread.section_title: Superior Van & Mobility Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Superior Van & Mobility | www.superiorvan.com
thread.title: GREGORY AND JANET HILL
thread.title_full: Superior Van & Mobility reviewed by GREGORY AND JANET HILL

author: GREGORY AND JANET HILL
title: GREGORY AND JANET HILL
text: Superior Van's staff was extremely helpful in explaining the features of wheelchair vans, making comparisons and helping us choose the best van for our needs. Courteous and professional in every way. We are very pleased with our van.
